item.title: [PI] Addstarter/login
item.dc:creator: @pur3rafael pur3rafael
item.description:
@pur3rafael wrote:

So everytime I login the account gets starters stuff. So the problem is it ainâ€™t giving NEW players stuff only, but already registered ones too.

My addstarter from PA:

public void addStarter() { if (!Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { c.getItems().addItem(1323, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1309, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1333, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1319, 1); c.getItems().addItem(7458, 1); /*c.getItems().addItem(1931, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2309, 1);*/ c.getItems().addItem(380, 100); c.getItems().addItem(1265, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1351, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1205, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1277, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1171, 1); c.getItems().addItem(841, 1); c.getItems().addItem(882, 100); c.getItems().addItem(556, 100); c.getItems().addItem(558, 100); c.getItems().addItem(555, 80); c.getItems().addItem(557, 80); c.getItems().addItem(559, 80); c.getItems().addItem(995, 1500000); c.getItems().addItem(2528, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); c.getDH().sendDialogues(62, 0); Connection.addIpToStarterList1(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); Connection.addIpToStarter1(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); c.sendMessage("@red@Thanks for joining! You have received a special item: Whip."); c.sendMessage("@red@Rub the lamp to choose your starter!"); c.sendMessage("@red@Type ::train to train instantly."); } else if (Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom) && !Connection.hasRecieved2ndStarter(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { c.getItems().addItem(1323, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1309, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1333, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1319, 1); c.getItems().addItem(7458, 1); /*c.getItems().addItem(1931, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2309, 1);*/ c.getItems().addItem(380, 100); c.getItems().addItem(1265, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1351, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1205, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1277, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1171, 1); c.getItems().addItem(841, 1); c.getItems().addItem(882, 100); c.getItems().addItem(882, 100); c.getItems().addItem(556, 100); c.getItems().addItem(558, 100); c.getItems().addItem(555, 80); c.getItems().addItem(557, 80); c.getItems().addItem(559, 80); c.getItems().addItem(995, 1500000); c.getItems().addItem(2528, 1); c.getDH().sendDialogues(62, 0); c.sendMessage("You have received 2 out of 2 starter packages."); c.sendMessage("@red@Rub the lamp to choose your starter!"); c.sendMessage("@red@Type ::train to train instantly."); Connection.addIpToStarterList2(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); Connection.addIpToStarter2(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); } else if (Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom) && Connection.hasRecieved2ndStarter(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { c.sendMessage("You have already received 2 starters!"); //recieved received } }

I tried removing 2 ip starter thingy, still keeps giving users starter stuff.

Client.java

if (addStarter) getPA().showInterface(3559); canChangeAppearance = true; getPA().addStarter();

If I put the interface below addStarter ^ it keeps showing design interface even for already registered users too.
